title: New To League Of Legends - Need Friends
body:
Hi all,

I've recently started playing the game of League of Legends, threw $50 into my account, to buy champion bundles, for drafting at level 10.. I'm level 8 at the moment, I wouldn't mind people to add me, to teach me how to play the game.

I'm thinking of picking up jungle & top as my two main roles of interest!

Feel free to add me, game seems fun. :)

Thanks!

replies.body: i just started playing for like 2 weeks, would like to learn as well if you wanna play?
If you don’t mind playing with a supp-only main feel free to add me in game. I have discord as well :)
Although I’m a bronzie who’s terrible at the game, I can teach you how to jungle
